abstract: In his annual letter to shareholders, Warren E. Buffett chided himself but also needled regulators and chief executives.
snippet: In his annual letter to shareholders, Warren E. Buffett chided himself but also needled regulators and chief executives.
lead_paragraph: The renowned investor Warren E. Buffett chided himself and the business world at large in his annual letter to shareholders of his holding company on Saturday as he sifted through the wreckage of his worst year in four decades.

headline.main: In Letter, Warren Buffett Concedes a Tough Year
headline.print_headline: In Letter, Buffett Accepts Blame and Faults Others
